channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- SonicWall Email Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- SonicWall Email Security

item.title: CVE-2023-0655|2024-08-02T05:17:50.347Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20email%20security
item.description: SonicWall Email Security contains a vulnerability that could permit a remote unauthenticated attacker access to an error page that includes sensitive information about users email addresses.
